website_summaries.verdict: The CrazyFlight Bounce 3 takes its style inspiration from Adidas’ running shoe line. It also uses the brand’s proprietary Bounce cushioning for impact protection. Comfortable, gippy, bouncy, and stylish — everything you need in your next pair of volleyball shoes.
pros: A majority of owners describe the Adidas CrazyFlight Bounce 3 as a very comfortable playing shoe
The type of rubber used for the outsole impresses a lot of players because it is very grippy
Many reviewers commend the durability of this Adidas volleyball shoe because it lasted beyond the season
The snug rearfoot fit effectively locks the heel down and prevents slippage, note multiple wearers
According to several people, this footwear is easy on the pocket
Some athletes appreciate how light the footgear feels on their feet
cons: A commenter is not very pleased that the CrazyFlight Bounce 3 easily attracts dirt
A user admits that she likes the style of this volleyball trainer but notes that it looks a bit clunky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I was so worried that they would not fit right but that was not the case. They looked gigantic but they were the right size and a perfect fit. I play pickleball in them and did not have to "Break" them in at all. They are not heavy which is a great assest for me since I have bad knees. I don't even think of my shoes once I am playing they are like just an extension of my feet. I highly recommend these court shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Run really big/ cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my daughter a size 9, she currently wears a size 10 in Nike, and they were way to big. Like the look of them and she said they were comfortable but they run really really big. Sent them back and got a smaller size. She wore them to one practice and the sole on the front of the toe started to seperate. Currently waiting on another pair. This is our team shoe so she has no choice but to wear them, otherwise we would stick with her Nike or Mizuno. Not impressed so far. Thank you to Amazon for handling our situation so well, very accommodating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick Material
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but the material is really thick. Makes your feet look really huge. They do fit to size tho..
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit large, but very nice, supportive, good-looking, comfortable shoes. Make sure you wear them with ankle socks or higher to avoid chafing.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kline

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these shoes. Loves the look and feel.... however after less than 2 months of indoor volleyball practice... the right shoe’s sole was pulling apart
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: Teenagers approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves theses volleyball shoes. She says there really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: They fit
customer_reviews.text: Work great on the court. Traction is exceptional and ankle support is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Hysell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for volleyball, took a few weeks to break them in but once they are broken in she loves them. Great price, cheaper than the big stores in town.
customer_reviews.author: TJones

customer_reviews.title: VB shoes
customer_reviews.text: Runs a half size to high Daughter wears an 11 I got her a 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved these. They fit great and held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Foerster

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has played in a handful of matches in these shoes and really likes them. No break-in period was needed. She says they are really light. From a looks standpoint, she has received several compliments. Definitely recommend them...with the price so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Overman

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Width is perfect for a wider foot, which is why we chose Adidas. Have held up thus far.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Size down a half size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Good quality. My daughter really likes Adidas volleyball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: My daugther wanted these for volleyball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these shoes. fits true to size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: shoes run big
customer_reviews.text: Soles look good for courts. Shoes run big. They don't feel like 90 dollar shoes but she didn't get to wear them as we had to return them for a smaller size. Be aware you will pay for return shipping and will not get a refund until they receive them and inspect everything. What a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them! A little big, but she just wears thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Feist

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run big. My daughter wears the same size in most shoes. These run about a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Testerman

customer_reviews.title: A plus volleyball shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome!! My daughter plays school and club volleyball and these have been the best volleyball shoes she has had. The fit is true to size and fit very comfortably. Great grip!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Fit great with her braces!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them! So happy to be able to find a 13.5 shoe. It fit almost like a 14 in other brands but was perfect to wear with her hard ankle braces, so it worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carter

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love this order was some fast shipping for this one, was expecting this item way later but got it first this week.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great little shoe. Fits and performs as expected. Daughter loves then.
customer_reviews.author: petra's mom

customer_reviews.title: fit 1/2 size to big
customer_reviews.text: Love the all white and the bottom grip of the shoe. Just fit 1/2 size to large.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: It feels like your feet are surrounded by cushioning and they're not only very comfy but very easy to run and move in.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, I can't wait to get the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, and light weight with lots of grip
customer_reviews.text: Heel slips a small amount. We were able to use the lace holes to adjust the heel back tight though
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cox

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was pleased with the shoe and said it fit comfortably. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: abe raziq

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but would suggest order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Fit to big
customer_reviews.text: The size was to big, I had to order it again one size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Angel

customer_reviews.title: One problem
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a perfect fit, however they arrived dirty!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Crazyflight Bounce 3 Shoes Volleyball
product_meta.description: Fill the court to dominate every point. These lightweight volleyball shoes show off a sleek, running-inspired silhouette. Their breathable mesh upper dials up the comfort, while integrated TPU fibres add extra stability and abrasion resistance. A comfortable cushioned midsole keeps you on the front foot.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper with lightweight moulded TPU yarns
Grippy rubber outsole for indoor surfaces, Textile lining
